Message:
After that, all of us
left the shelter behind.

“We’re sure to run out
of food eventually.

So, while we can all still move,
we should go find
a safer place to shelter!”
That’s what we all
decided together.

My map had all the different
routes I’d found written on it.

If we keep going down these
while avoiding all the X’s
and find a safer route,
then surely...!

There were people who said
they were scared to leave at first...

And well, it wasn’t like
I could guarantee we wouldn’t
cross paths with any demons
along the way.

But, rather than getting stuck
in a place worrying,
it’s better to imagine
something fun just around
the bend and keep going~

None of us can know
what might lie ahead, after all.

We can only find out
if we go there ourselves~

That’s why we’re all going
to keep marching.

Marching across the land
to find out the shape
of the world for ourselves,
so we can keep moving forward!

The adventurer Eureka’s
journey still has a long,
long way to go~!
